title: Citizen communication management volume and spend

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please answer the following questions relating to your citizen communications management:
A: SCANNERS
1. Please name all of the IT resellers that you have contacts with and buy from:
2. What is the length of the contracts, more specifically their end date, with the named IT resellers in question 1?
3. What year and month is the next hardware refresh due?
4. Please state the number of devices deployed:
5. Please name the brand of the devices mentioned:
6. Please give details on how these were procured. (e.g., by Framework)
i. Procurement method?
ii. If Framework, please state which one
7. Who is the person(s) within your organization responsible for these contract(s)? Please provide their title and their contact details.
B: PRINTERS
1. Please name all of the IT resellers that you have contacts with and buy from?
2. What is the length of the contracts, more specifically their end date, with the named IT resellers in question 1?

4. Please name the number of devices deployed:

6. Please give details on how these were procured. (e.g. By Framework)
i. Procurement method?
ii. If Framework, please state which one.
7. What is your annual print/copy volume and spend?
- Total Pages Printed?
- Scanned Pages?
- Colour Printing Ratio %?
- Total Click Charge (£) £?
8. Who is the person(s) within your organization responsible for these contract(s)? Please provide their title and their contact details.
C: DIGITAL & POSTAGE
1.	Who supplies your e-billing (email distribution / digital portal) capability?
2.	How many e-bills (i.e. council tax) do you send each year?
3.	How many e-bills (i.e. council tax) are retrieved from your online portal each year?
4.	How much do you pay for your e-billing service annually?
5.	When does your e-billing contract expire?
6.	Who is the person within your organisation responsible for this contract/s? Please provide their title and contact details.
7.	What is your annual spend on postage relating to citizen communications (e.g. revenues and benefits, electoral services, everyday ad hoc mail)?
Yours faithfully,
Matthew Howell

Dear Matthew Howell,
Thank you for your request for information relating to citizen
communication management volume and spend which we received on 16/08/2023.
We apologise for the delay in responding.
Please find the response below.
Please answer the following questions relating to your citizen
communications management:
A: SCANNERS
1. Please name all of the IT resellers that you have contacts with and buy
from: Right Digital Solutions and Specialist Computer Centres
2. What is the length of the contracts, more specifically their end date,
with the named IT resellers in question 1? Contacts end 31/03/24 and
23/06/24
3. What year and month is the next hardware refresh due? We expect a need
to refresh the majority of our devices within the next 3 years
4. Please state the number of devices deployed: Around 260 multifunctional
devices plus around 300 desktop scanners / desktop MFD’s
5. Please name the brand of the devices mentioned: Kyocera and HP
6. Please give details on how these were procured. (e.g., by Framework) i.
Procurement method? Tender / Framework
ii. If Framework, please state which one 7. Who is the person(s) within
your organization responsible for these contract(s)? Please provide their
title and their contact details. G-Cloud
B: PRINTERS
1. Please name all of the IT resellers that you have contacts with and buy
from? Right Digital Solutions and Specialist Computer Centres
2. What is the length of the contracts, more specifically their end date,
with the named IT resellers in question 1? As above
3. What year and month is the next hardware refresh due? As above
4. Please name the number of devices deployed: As above
5. Please name the brand of the devices mentioned: As above
6. Please give details on how these were procured. (e.g. By Framework) i.
Procurement method? As above
ii. If Framework, please state which one.
7. What is your annual print/copy volume and spend?
- Total Pages Printed? 2,374,358
- Scanned Pages? Information not held
- Colour Printing Ratio %? 25
- Total Click Charge (£) £? Part of a managed service
8. Who is the person(s) within your organization responsible for these
contract(s)? Please provide their title and their contact details.
C: DIGITAL & POSTAGE
1.          Who supplies your e-billing (email distribution / digital
portal) capability? Capita
2.          How many e-bills (i.e. council tax) do you send each year? In
March 2023 as part of annual billing for the year commencing 1 April 2023
the Council Tax service created 18,228 e-bills (including exemption
notices).  Please note, this does not include any e-bills created
throughout the year.
3.          How many e-bills (i.e. council tax) are retrieved from your
online portal each year? To date 6,056 have been viewed.
4.          How much do you pay for your e-billing service annually? There
is no separate charge for the e-billing module, it is included in the
overall contract with Capita.
5.          When does your e-billing contract expire? 30/06/2025
6.          Who is the person within your organisation responsible for
this contract/s? Please provide their title and contact details.
[1]Submitting a bid for a tender opportunity | Sheffield City Council
7.          What is your annual spend on postage relating to citizen
communications (e.g. revenues and benefits, electoral services, everyday
ad hoc mail)? Information not recorded.
If you have any queries about this response, please do not hesitate to
contact us.
